Material used.Description: Experiments were conducted using HEK293 cells expressing LRRK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased kinase activity observed in G2019S-expressing cells.
Reduced kinase activity in R1441C-expressing cells.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was repeated three times.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and Student's t-test were used.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity within 10% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity deviating by >20% from wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: Protein expression levels were analyzed in HEK293 cells.

Readout description.Result Description: Elevated LRRK2 protein levels in G2019S-expressing cells.
Reduced LRRK2 protein levels in R1441C-expressing cells.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and Student's t-test were used.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression within 15% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression deviating by >30% from wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: Protein-protein interactions were analyzed in HEK293 cells.

Readout description.Result Description: Altered interaction with Rab10 in G2019S-expressing cells.
Reduced interaction with Rab10 in R1441C-expressing cells.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was repeated three times.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and Student's t-test were used.

Material used.Description: Transcriptional activity was analyzed in HEK293 cells.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased transcriptional activity in G2019S-expressing cells.
Reduced transcriptional activity in R1441C-expressing cells.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was repeated three times.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and Student's t-test were used.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Transcriptional activity within 10% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Transcriptional activity deviating by >20% from wild-type levels.
